title: How to Draw a Vase

steps.headline: Lightly draw an oval for the guideline of the object.
steps.description: Follow the shape of the vase or picture. You may want to the bottom a little flatter, the bottom half of an ellipse. Read about how to draw a cylinder for more information on getting the perspective right for the top and bottom edges of the vase.

steps.headline: Now, pressing harder, draw the rim and the rest of the outline, trying to make it look as smooth as possible.
Erase the excess lines or construction lines from the first step.
Draw details, such as artwork on the surface.
Color in.
steps.description: For a realistic look, add highlights, shading, and shadow.

text: Lightly draw an oval for the guideline of the object. Follow the shape of the vase or picture. You may want to the bottom a little flatter, the bottom half of an ellipse. Read about how to draw a cylinder for more information on getting the perspective right for the top and bottom edges of the vase. Now, pressing harder, draw the rim and the rest of the outline, trying to make it look as smooth as possible.  Erase the excess lines or construction lines from the first step.  Draw details, such as artwork on the surface.  Color in. For a realistic look, add highlights, shading, and shadow.
